title: PROJECT Boarders
body:
So.... I did all the missions except the Emote one (beat SR in under 33 mins).
I bought the Hunter Icon with boarders. So when exactly do we get them? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: The borders themselves are tied to that icon actually! Once you have the icon unlocked, using one of the 3 new project skins should have the border applied.
